task.title: Lengthen Objects
task.shortdesc: You can change the length of entities or the included angle of arcs. The results are similar to extending and trimming.

context.p: This command does not affect the closed entities.
Use any of the following methods to change the length of an entity:

ul.li: Dynamically drag the endpoint or angle.
Specify an incremental length or angle measured froman endpoint.
Specify the new length as a percentage of the total length or angle.
Specify a new length or included an angle.
You can change the length of arcs, lines, open polylines, ellipse arc and open spline.

context.p: To change the length of an object by dragging

step.cmd: Choose Modify > Lengthen from the mainmenu.
On the command line, type DY (DYnamic).
Select the object you want to change.
Specify the new endpoint or includedan angle.

result.p: Select the object (A), and then select the new endpoint (B)
